info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:55PM EDT until June 25 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR OAKLAND COUNTY... At 654 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pontiac, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Oxford and Rochester around 705 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Lathrup Village, Auburn Hills and Bingham Farms. People attending M1 Concourse , and Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
